Html: I think a neat control to add would be something like we see in Mac OSX - the fisheye navigation control. You can see it also at the dojo project: http://dojotoolkit.org/

I like that control. :-) Off hand it doesn’t seem too hard to implement. I think I’ll add it to my list of controls to do in the near future.

Thanks,
Scorn
Just off the top of your head, any ideas on how you will implement it? I've been looking for some open-source fisheye-like control and haven't found any. Have you seen or heard of anything out there?

I’ve not heard of anyone doing this control. I may find that GDI+ cannot scale the image smoothly enough but the challenge sounds fun.

I will work on a design soon. A custom render on the stock toolbar may be doable but may not be the way to go. I will have to do a proof on concept before I know what can and can’t be done.

I’m afraid progress on the controls has slowed considerably in the last 2 months. My day job has expanded to most waking hours in order to meet a deadline. This will be over (I think) by the end of the month and I can get back to what I enjoy, working on the controls.

Thanks,
Scorn
